timeline.bodyText: if we are not removing the model package, then better to leave CaseDetails in uk.gov.hmcts.ccd.domain.model where all the other domain classes are
timeline.author: mario-paniccia

replies.bodyText: reverted this to model.definition after discussion
replies.author: kiran-yenigala-hmcts

timeline.bodyText: in this particular case adding the Definitions suffix will make things a bit confusing because we are creating a display object. Possible to revert the method rename?
timeline.author: mario-paniccia

timeline.bodyText: shall we rename the method names too?
timeline.author: mario-paniccia

timeline.bodyText: shall we rename the method names too?
timeline.author: mario-paniccia

timeline.bodyText: I think for consistency with the other domain classes better to leave these in domain.model?
timeline.author: mario-paniccia
